subject_terms_3: Vanishing trade Textile art and design
physical_appearance: This is a packet containing strings of seed beads in various shades. The beads of the same colour are strung along a white string, forming bundles. The strings of beads are placed in a brown packet.
sgcool_label_text:
This packet contains strings of seed beads in various shades. Seed beads are hallmarks of Peranakan needlework and were traditionally referred to as manek potong (cut beads) regardless of the types of beads at hand. These examples show the variety of beads available to embroiderers working in Malacca and Singapore.

The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses,
subject_terms_1: Peranakan sewing tools tailors beadwork (visual works)
subject_terms_2: Beads Peranakan (Asian people) Sewing Equipment and supplies Tailors Clothing trade Bead embroidery
